DOC.detailed_description: A variety trial immunotherapy metastatic melanoma clearly demonstrate immune response melanoma induce , patient respond clinically , suggest new strategy enhance anti-cancer immune response need . Most immunotherapy trial focus antigen delivery provide stimulatory antigen-specific signal T cell . However , induction antigen-specific T cell-mediated immune response regulate stimulatory signal , also inhibitory receptor-mediated signal . Studies demonstrate administer mAbs target immune-modulating receptor T cell enhance vaccine-induced anti-tumor immunity , suggest approach might improve efficacy clinical cancer vaccine . However , systemic administration mAbs associate severe , sometimes fatal , autoimmunity . We develop approach target delivery immune modulatory protein mAbs , use immune modulator RNA-transfected dendritic cell ( DC ) , sit anti-tumor T cell induce . Our preliminary study indicate approach may eliminate adverse effect associate systemic administration immune modulators , also enhance vaccine-induced immune response . DOC.criteria: Patients confirm metastatic melanoma Karnofsky performance status great equal 70 % . Estimated life expectancy > 6 month . Age > 17 year .
